entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
